Game Description: 

Injustice: Gods Among Us - The most complete edition of the company's NetherRealm Studios is a bold innovations in the genre faytingovy games.
In this powerful edition of six new playable characters, over 30 new costumes and new missions Lab S.T.A.R. In this latest game from the award-winning studio offers not only iconic characters DC Comics, such as Batman, The Joker, Green Lantern, Flash, Superman and Wonder Woman, but also a deep original story. In a world where the line between good and evil, heroes and villains come together in a battle of epic proportions.
